quotes:
[]Author: brian rogers;
Rating: 5
When: 3 months ago
A good place for parents because you can see the playroom from the bar. Very nice & helpful folks all around this amazing hotel. Great rooms in a great neighborhood to stroll around in. At Christmas, there's a small x-mas market next door, and it's near a million shops. From the lounge, you can see the only entrance/exit from the children's playroom, so if you want to grab an espresso or something stronger, you can keep an eye on your kids (6yoa & 7 yoa at the time of this writing). If you do stop by the bar, ask for Fares (Ferris), a very understanding bartender who doesn't bat an eyelash when you run to the playroom to see who's crying!

Author: Anastasiya Maykut;
Rating: 5
When: 8 months ago
I came to Paris for my 20th birthday. My friends had easily contacted the management and they organized a beautiful surprise in my room for that day. They circled up on me constantly and were very kind and welcoming. The breakfast was very good: croissants were amazing! Also the pastry chef is amazing! Quentin Lechat. Recommend!

Author: Ilko Radulov;
Rating: 5
When: a year ago
Great hotel in the Paris city center, everything you need for a great family vacation. Extremely friendly staff. Great service, very comfortable beds. They offer a rich buffet breakfast. Incredible organization and hygiene! I recommend it.

Author: Neil Timson;
Rating: 5
When: a year ago
This place is amazing, especially for the amount of money. By far the best Novotel Iâ€™ve stayed in. From the point of approaching the front door, the staff were completely on point. They were amazingly nice and accommodating. We were able to check into our room early. The room is spacious and well equipped. Itâ€™s modern and clean with 2 beds. Extremely happy with my choice and wouldnâ€™t think of staying on another hotel

Author: Federica Marzola;
Rating: 5
When: a year ago
There are so many reasons why I love this hotel! First of all: Kindness! Here I found the best receptionist ever: Djamel! Heâ€™s very kind and he will help you to find everything youâ€™re looking for spend a great holiday! He will do the best he can to be sure you have all you need! So if you are staying in this hotel, ask for him! Second: this hotel is located right in the city centre so in few minutes by walk you have the opportunity to visit the most famous attractions! If you prefer use the public transport, the underground station in right in front of the entrance of the hotel! Third: the hotel is clean and you can also enjoy a great and continental breakfast, full of delicious croissants and waffles and cheese! Ci sono molte ragioni per cui amo questo hotel!
